items.text_for_match: 1,000 games in, Guardiola has new energy for new era Sunday began with a celebration of Pep Guardiola and ended in the same manner, with the Manchester City boss showing he has new energy in a new era for the club. Sunday began with a celebration of Pep Guardiola and ended in the same manner, with the Manchester City boss showing he has new energy in a new era for the club.

items.ja: Doku shines as Man City cruise to win over Liverpool
items.en: Doku shines as Man City cruise to win over Liverpool
items.text_for_match: Doku shines as Man City cruise to win over Liverpool Jeremy Doku scores the pick of the goals with a stunning curling effort, as Manchester City soundly defeat Liverpool 3-0 at the Etihad Stadium to move up to second in the Premier League. Jeremy Doku scores the pick of the goals with a stunning curling effort, as Manchester City soundly defeat Liverpool 3-0 at the Etihad Stadium to move up to second in the Premier League.

items.ja: A draw was a fair result - Glasner

items.ja: Why VAR gets involved in some penalties but not others
items.en: Why VAR gets involved in some penalties but not others
items.text_for_match: Why VAR gets involved in some penalties but not others It was a weekend of VAR penalty decisions in the Premier League, with spot-kicks awarded, cancelled and ignored. BBC Sport explains why. It was a weekend of VAR penalty decisions in the Premier League, with spot-kicks awarded, cancelled and ignored. BBC Sport explains why.

items.ja: Brentford were relentless - Andrews on win over Newcastle
items.en: Brentford were relentless - Andrews on win over Newcastle
items.text_for_match: Brentford were relentless - Andrews on win over Newcastle Keith Andrews believes his side got the result they "deserved" as Brentford come from a goal down to beat Newcastle 3-1 at the Gtech Community Stadium in the Premier League. items.ja: 'It's a good marker for us' - Dyche on first PL win with Forest
items.en: 'It's a good marker for us' - Dyche on first PL win with Forest
items.text_for_match: 'It's a good marker for us' - Dyche on first PL win with Forest Sean Dyche says he is "very pleased" with his side's performance after Nottingham Forest come from a goal down to beat Leeds United 3-1 at the City Ground. Sean Dyche says he is "very pleased" with his side's performance after Nottingham Forest come from a goal down to beat Leeds United 3-1 at the City Ground.

items.ja: 'Not impossible but very unlikely' - will Edwards save Wolves?
items.en: 'Not impossible but very unlikely' - will Edwards save Wolves?
items.text_for_match: 'Not impossible but very unlikely' - will Edwards save Wolves? Match of the Day pundits Wayne Rooney and Danny Murphy believe Rob Edwards has "too big a mountain" to climb to keep Wolves in the Premier League. Match of the Day pundits Wayne Rooney and Danny Murphy believe Rob Edwards has "too big a mountain" to climb to keep Wolves in the Premier League.

items.ja: How energetic Villa outworked Bournemouth in big win
items.en: How energetic Villa outworked Bournemouth in big win
items.text_for_match: How energetic Villa outworked Bournemouth in big win Match of the Day pundit Wayne Rooney says the "commitment" shown by Aston Villa on and off the ball was the key to their emphatic 4-0 win over Bournemouth at Villa Park. items.ja: How 'electric' Doku helped Man City 'dismantle' Liverpool
items.en: How 'electric' Doku helped Man City 'dismantle' Liverpool
items.text_for_match: How 'electric' Doku helped Man City 'dismantle' Liverpool Match of the Day pundit Danny Murphy believes Jeremy Doku had "the best game he's ever had in a Manchester City shirt" as Pep Guardiola's side dominanted Liverpool in a 3-0 win at the Etihad Stadium. items.ja: 'Man City make ominous statement in brutal lesson for Liverpool'
items.en: 'Man City make ominous statement in brutal lesson for Liverpool'
items.text_for_match: 'Man City make ominous statement in brutal lesson for Liverpool' Manchester City deliver an ominous statement of intent by outclassing Liverpool in Pep Guardiola's 1,000th match as a manager, says Phil McNulty. Manchester City deliver an ominous statement of intent by outclassing Liverpool in Pep Guardiola's 1,000th match as a manager, says Phil McNulty.

items.ja: VAR denies Brighton penalty in goalless draw with Palace
items.en: VAR denies Brighton penalty in goalless draw with Palace
items.text_for_match: VAR denies Brighton penalty in goalless draw with Palace Rivals Crystal Palace and Brighton settle for a point apiece from a largely dour Premier League tussle at Selhurst Park, where VAR intervention quashed a penalty award to the Seagulls. Rivals Crystal Palace and Brighton settle for a point apiece from a largely dour Premier League tussle at Selhurst Park, where VAR intervention quashed a penalty award to the Seagulls.

items.ja: Forest beat Leeds for Dyche's first Premier League win
items.en: Forest beat Leeds for Dyche's first Premier League win
items.text_for_match: Forest beat Leeds for Dyche's first Premier League win Nottingham Forest come from behind to beat relegation rivals Leeds United and earn their first Premier League win under manager Sean Dyche. items.ja: Thiago double helps Brentford beat 10-man Newcastle
items.en: Thiago double helps Brentford beat 10-man Newcastle

items.ja: Guardiola's 'special' win over Liverpool in 1,000th game
items.en: Guardiola's 'special' win over Liverpool in 1,000th game
items.text_for_match: Guardiola's 'special' win over Liverpool in 1,000th game Pep Guardiola believes "the universe dictated" that his 1,000th game as a manager had to be against Liverpool, as the Spaniard savoured a 3-0 win on his landmark day in the dugout.
